agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, March 12, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. John Zerwas The House Appropriations Committee will meet to consider budget recommendations for Articles IX, salary requests, CAPPs, Information Technology, Cybersecurity, Legacy Modernization, Capital Needs, and any remaining pending items. The committee will hear invited testimony only. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
